list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: lift or haul (a heavy thing) with great effort.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she heaved the sofa back into place
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy đã ném vào ghế sofa trở lại vị trí

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he heaved a euphoric sigh of relief

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: rise and fall rhythmically or spasmodically.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his shoulders heaved as he panted
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Vai của anh ấy nặng nề khi anh ấy thở hổn hển

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of heaving, especially a strong pull.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: with that last heave, Maurice's anchor wrenched clear of the mud
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Với thứ cuối cùng đó, mỏ neo của Maurice vặn vẹo bùn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sideways displacement in a fault.
a case of retching or vomiting.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: waiting for the heaves to subside
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chờ đợi những món ăn giảm bớt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a disease of horses, with labored breathing.
